p: Cytotoxicity was examined using a LDH release assay ( n = 3 per group). A LDH cytotoxicity assay kit from Biovision (Mountain View, CA, USA) was used according to the manufacturerâ€™s recommendations. The optical density values were quantified by measuring absorbance at a wavelength of 450 nm, using a microplate reader (Emax, Molecular Devices, Sunnyvale, CA, USA) [ 16].
